title: Weekly hours worked by children vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The vertical axis shows average weekly working hours for children ages 7-14 who are involved in an economic activity for at least one hour in the reference week of the corresponding survey (irrespective of school attendance). The horizontal axis shows GDP per capita after adjusting for differences in prices across countries and inflation (constant international dollars).
sourceDesc: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024; 2023)
